items.content_html:
The following issues are referenced by more than one item in activities.json, which is incompatible with #1063 . I will split them up by filing new issues.

  • #93
    • CSS Layout API
    • CSS Painting API
    • CSS Properties and Values API
    • CSS Typed OM
    • Worklets
  • #60
    • Custom elements
    • HTML Imports
    • Shadow trees (formerly known as Shadow DOM)
    • template element
  • #27
    • Web Share API
    • Web Share Target API
items.title: Use separate issues for separate standards positions

items.content_html:
Request for Mozilla Position on an Emerging Web Specification

  • Specification title: Storage Access Headers
  • Specification or proposal URL (if available): https://privacycg.github.io/storage-access-headers/
  • Explainer URL (if available): https://github.com/privacycg/storage-access-headers
  • Proposal author(s) (@-mention GitHub accounts): @cfredric @johannhof
  • Caniuse.com URL (optional):
  • Bugzilla URL (optional): TBD
  • Mozillians who can provide input (optional): @bvandersloot-mozilla
  • WebKit standards-position: WebKit/standards-positions#412

Other information

The Storage Access Headers proposal creates new HTTP request and response headers to enable authenticated embeds to access third-party cookies, even without an iframe, via existing storage-access permission grants.
items.title: Storage Access Headers

items.content_html:
Request for Mozilla Position on focus-without-user-activation feature policy

  • Specification title: focus-without-user-activation feature policy
  • Specification or proposal URL (if available): whatwg/html#4585. The spec PR needs to be updated to reflect default value of self.
  • Explainer URL (if available): https://github.com/w3c/webappsec-permissions-policy/blob/main/policies/focus-without-user-activation.md
  • Proposal author(s) (@-mention GitHub accounts): @siliu1 @clelland
  • Caniuse.com URL (optional):
  • Bugzilla URL (optional):
  • Mozillians who can provide input (optional):
  • WebKit standards-position: WebKit/standards-positions#406

Other information

This issue is discussed during TPAC 2024 in webappsec and whatwg meeting.

The issue was resolved with proposed resolution:

RESOLVED: The default value of focus-without-user-activation feature policy should be self. Focus delegation should also be allowed (allow parent frame programmatically set focus into child iframe).
items.title: `focus-without-user-activation` feature policy
